channel.title: KVM Bugs and Errors
channel.description:
Hello!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM I have a many errors and questions. Begin.
> sudo apt-get install qxl-xorg-enhance > [sudo] password for w: > Reading package lists... Done > Building dependency tree > Reading state information... Done > E: Unable to locate package qxl-xorg-enhance
No package in Ubuntu 16.04.
> virsh -c qemu:///system net-start default > error: Failed to start network default > error: Requested operation is not valid: network is already active
Cool, what to do?

item.title: KVM Bugs and Errors
item.dc:creator: Taulo
item.description:
Whonix

KVM

Using Whonix with KVM instead of VirtualBox


I can’t understand, need do “mv” or “cp --sparse=always” ?

Probably there is no difference.

Read full topic

item.title: KVM Bugs and Errors
item.dc:creator: Taulo
item.description:
virsh -c qemu:///system net-start default
error: Failed to start network default
error: Requested operation is not valid: network is already active

virsh net-destroy default
Network default destroyed

virsh -c qemu:///system net-start default
Network default started

Read full topic

item.title: KVM Bugs and Errors
item.dc:creator: Taulo
item.description:
qxl-xorg-enhance Universal installation (Guest OS, into Whonix)
Only for Whonix’s old versions, 12 and below??? (slow in 13 for me):

sudo su
echo -e ‘Section “Device”’’\n Identifier “qxl”’’\n Driver “qxl”’’\n Option “ENABLE_SURFACES” “False”’’\nEndSection’ >"/usr/share/X11/xorg.conf.d/50-qxl.conf"
reboot

Read full topic

item.title: KVM Bugs and Errors
item.dc:creator: Taulo
item.description:
Hello!

Whonix

KVM

Using Whonix with KVM instead of VirtualBox


I have a many errors and questions. Begin.

sudo apt-get install qxl-xorg-enhance
[sudo] password for w:
Reading package lists… Done
Building dependency tree
Reading state information… Done
E: Unable to locate package qxl-xorg-enhance

No package in Ubuntu 16.04.

virsh -c qemu:///system net-start default
error: Failed to start network default
error: Requested operation is not valid: network is already active

Cool, what to do?

Read full topic
